name: JD1WordoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Words and their definitions don't have to be boring. Learning can be fun. In this series we'll dive into a fun word each day. We will explore their meaning and observe how they can be used.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
